FuncDef: The reset dot1x statistics command clears 802.1X authentication statistics. The reset dot1x statistics command clears 802.1X authentication statistics. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears 802.1X statistics on a specified interface.
-

Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
